description: Marcus Mojo has taken an interest in body building.  It's no surprise, I mean take a look at his incredible body!  Those abs, that amazing chest, those irresistible thighs...it's no wonder he's known for the best bod in the biz. Johnny Torque is joining Marcus to help him work out a few sleek poses for an upcoming amateur competition.  These guys know that the most important muscle is the one that swells up on its own, without any pumping iron.  That's why they decided to have a post-workout fuck session!  Watch Marcus gulp down Johnny's thick boner muscle with the passion of a true weight room stud.  Then see Johnny return the favor before he pounds Marcus's sweet, well toned ass.Enjoy!
title: Muscle Bound Ass Pound
